programme.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
programme.desc: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

programme.title: Glastonbury 2024
programme.desc: Chris Martin's band make musical history by headlining at the Pyramid Stage a record-breaking five times. Grammy award-winning singer Dua Lipa also graces the Pyramid Stage – seven years after her festival debut – while country-pop crossover singer Shania Twain follows in the footsteps of Diana Ross, Dolly Parton and Kylie Minogue by taking the coveted Sunday afternoon ‘legend' slot.

programme.title: Ape vs. Mecha Ape
programme.desc: Recognizing the destructive power of its captive giant Ape, the military makes its own battle-ready A.I., Mecha Ape but its first practical test goes horribly wrong, leaving the military no choice but to release the imprisoned giant ape to stop the colossal robot before it destroys downtown Chicago.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: My Little Pony: Bridlewoodstock
programme.desc: Pipp and her pony friends throw a huge music festival during Bridlewood's Lumi-Bloom, a gorgeous bioluminescent nature event that only happens once a year!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Growing up wild is a whole lot of fun. To survive, baby animals must learn the same skills as we do - how to climb, swim, play and make friends. This enchanting series draws on the best of the BBC Natural History Unit archive to showcase the world's cutest animal babies as they embark on their journeys of discovery.Hosted by pre-school favourite Andy Day, each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals.

programme.title: Master Moley: By Royal Invitation
programme.desc: A young mole picks a rose from the Queen's Garden, not knowing that this simple act will change not only his life, but the life of all moles.

programme.title: Mighty Express Specials
programme.desc: Catching a ride with the 'Mighty Express', a team of trains and their kid-friends who go on exciting adventures and overcome trouble on the tracks with quick thinking and teamwork.

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid Special 4

programme.title: Lil Wild Specials S4
programme.desc: When the monkey's start to poach the park's property , Rara will not stand for this crime wave. She forms the Animal Police Academy, an elite animal security force, who will crack down on the simian crime ring and deliver a big scoop of justice for all, with extra sprinkles!

programme.title: Megamind vs. The Doom Syndicate
programme.desc: Megamind's former villain team, The Doom Syndicate, has returned. Newly crowned hero Megamind's must now keep up evil appearances until he can assemble his friends to stop his former evil teammates from launching Metro City to the Moon.

programme.title: PJ Masks S4
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: Famous Foodies S3
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what & where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood has never been to Japan. As far as he's concerned, it's a land without bread - and a land without bread, is a land without bakers. This three-part series sees Britain's favourite baker discover just how wrong he was - and how Japan is fast becoming one of the world's top foodie destinations. Across the series, Paul travels the country sampling regional delicacies and gets taught some of Japan's most famous dishes.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen
programme.desc: Popular chef Rachel Khoo now lives in the Swedish countryside in a charming, traditional wooden house that serves as her base for the series. In every episode, she meets up with local food producers or a Swedish chef and visits stores and restaurants that focus on Swedish craftsmanship. Then it's back home to the kitchen, where she puts her twist on local recipes, preparing delicious, healthy food that's easy for anyone to cook at home.

Each episode follows real children, ages 3-6, as they head out into the world by themselves, for the first time, to run everyday errands for their parents. What starts as simple, household tasks turns into hilarious adventures and heartwarming interactions.

programme.title: The Best I Could
programme.desc: Took Leng How had the mentality of a child and Huang Na was his best friend. Everyday, they played among the crates of vegetables in the wholesale market where Huang Na's mother worked. One day, she disappeared and so began one of the largest manhunts for Huang Na. programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 小娘惹翡翠山之开门见山
programme.desc: 艺人们登上台湾唯一活火山——龟山岛，展开一场耐力与体力的登山挑战，他们能否坚持到底？暄婷加入后，众人再度玩起“开门见山”游戏卡，爆笑不断却也触动心弦。有人坦言仍未找到自己，有人说自己只算“半个自己”。一次次真心交流，不仅加深了友谊，也让人更期待下一站的旅程。.

programme.title: 港女野人奇遇记
programme.desc: 新西兰人视打猎为杀戮游戏，还是平衡生态的手段？四位港女野人今集亲身体验狩猎活动寻找答案！四人分头访问狩猎用品店的负责人与顾客，了解当地人对打猎的看法，接着拜访真正的猎人Pete，听他讲述猎杀动物的原因，何以有人潸然落泪？拍摄团队带着矛盾心情到野外了解猎人的工作，主持们荷枪实弹进行射击训练，开枪的快感却带来反思！.

programme.title: 天行健
programme.desc: 晚清末年，社会动荡，净坛密藏宝图失窃，各方势力争夺。曾为御前侍卫的门三刀受命追回宝图，揭露幕后黑手。天津大沽县发生命案，九名死者由融天岭门人所杀，县衙捕快王地保独自追查凶手。与此同时，融天岭掌门卓不凡与淇亲王密谋联手夺宝，图谋利用宝藏来实现各自目的。三人不约而同前往上海，却无意间卷入一场波澜壮阔的历史风波。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 钱校尉等人“鬼愁营”私藏劳力采矿，中饱私囊之事被大白天下，商易之按军纪处决几名主犯，平复军中乱象，成功收服青州军。此时，徐静却查出军中粮草严重短缺，若北漠不日打来，毫无抵抗之力。商易之决定前去豫州，寻父亲旧部豫州守将石达春借粮。阿麦得知因北漠突袭，通关文牒暂时失效，决定先跟随商易之同去豫州，伺机再想他法。商易之与阿麦轻车简从出发，将军营暂交徐静坐镇。豫州城守石达春对唐绍义报信北漠突袭之事十分慎重，亦看重其才能，副将王寻却担心唐绍义被收编入豫州军会危及自己地位，带领手下处处挤兑。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.
